title: Newspaper headlines: 'Caution as pupils return' and 'Meghan speaks out'
description: Several of Monday's front pages lead with the return to the classroom for many pupils in England.

title: Bale and Kane doubles inspire Spurs to comfortable win over Palace
description: Gareth Bale and Harry Kane both score twice to inspire Tottenham to a third consecutive Premier League win at the expense of Crystal Palace.

title: Solskjaer rules out title chase as derby victory ends Man City's winning run
description: Boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer says Manchester United are not thinking about overhauling Premier League leaders Manchester City despite victory at Etihad Stadium.

title: Teenager Hodgkinson takes 800m gold as GB end Euro Indoors on high
description: Teenager Keely Hodgkinson further enhances her reputation by taking 800m gold for Great Britain who end the European Indoor Championships with 12 medals.

title: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe must be released 'permanently', says PM
description: The British-Iranian's five-year sentence on spying charges has ended, but she faces a separate court case.

title: Sarah Everard: Police confirm last sighting of missing woman
description: Sarah Everard has been missing from south London since Wednesday evening.

title: NHS 1% pay rise is 'as much as we can give' - Boris Johnson
description: Boris Johnson defends his pay rise proposals after a warning nurses may quit for feeling undervalued.

title: Covid-19: Suffolk 'shipwreck find could be 'really rare'
description: Wooden sections of boats were found at Covehithe, north of Southwold, and on Thorpeness beach.

title: Katy Sprague: The family piecing together an 'avoidable murder'
description: Katy Sprague's family believe if their concerns had been addressed she would still be alive today.

title: Who truly was the most dishonest president?
description: Past US presidents have left a legacy of untruths ranging from the bizarre to the horrifying.

title: Coming 2 America: 'The first black fairytale' revisited
description: Actress Nomzamo Mbatha on the importance of Coming 2 America "celebrating blackness" on screen.

title: The women of Egypt's Arab Spring
description: Ten years ago, Egyptians took to the streets calling for the overthrow of President Hosni Mubarak

title: How a ring tells the story of a forgotten secret agent
description: A war hero had been all but forgotten. But now his story can be told - thanks to his engagement ring.

title: Losing a twin: 'With great love, comes great loss’
description: The sister of a girl who died following a school bus crash speaks about how she copes with her grief.
